html:
4.5.25  7:34 pm   if you could change the color of any piece of furniture in your living space to any other color, what piece of furniture and what color?

      i would change it back to what it was before the previous person asked me to change it, but i didn't actually change it that time, so it is still the correct color which is also the reason i don't have to change it now

4.5.25  6:52 pm   Best cow for mooing?

      i'd have to say the moo cow

4.5.25  6:14 pm   i know exactly the emotional state i want to convey with this particular song but i just can't work out where the words should go or what they should be! should i just make it an instrumental?

      don't forget, the song already knows about your exact situation you're having while trying to write it

4.5.25  5:43 pm   Serious question: How can we balance sustainable space mining with interstellar alien minority protection? 

      with 2 evenly weighted rival propagandae

4.5.25  4:26 pm   i get really pent up with emotion sometimes and really just want to sing/make some music. so i'll sit down and try to make something and like, it sounds fine, but doesn't quite scratch the itch y'know. never can i sit down and accurately create something that sounds like an embodiment of what i'm feeling. is the solution to this to just keep making music the way i have been until i get better, or should i be making conscious moves in order to improve?

      all roads lead the way

4.5.25  3:54 pm   What's your opinion on desk lamps?

      adorable

4.5.25  3:26 pm   how to not be so fancy im no longer #relatable

      everyone is relatable. relatability is pretty much impossible to hide from

4.5.25  3:05 pm   Do our emotions tell us things, or do our things tell us emotions?

      with good communication, it can be a healthy dialogue

4.5.25  1:51 pm   What do you think of the number 667

      it's a multiple of 23 and 29. it's one third of 2001. it feels almost like one third of 2000 if you had to round it off the nearest integer

4.5.25  1:25 pm   What is the best time?

      possibly the future

4.5.25  10:45 am   rank the numbers from best to worst

      numbers don't know about bad and good

4.5.25  9:56 am   hi I'm sending this message from an airplane. how can you explain inflight wifi?

     heck, i can't even explain flight

     also what is your favorite airline?

      being a bird

4.5.25  8:13 am   do you think that someone could find meaning in your music the same way they would with and without a visual medium?
basically; is the video a core part of the song experience?

      it's meant to work both ways. we'll see if i can get the hang of it at some point

4.5.25  6:34 am   it feels like i can only do things if there are obvious defined parameters for success. it's tough for me to spend any time in the 'journey' without being obsessed with 'destination'. perfectionism, in other words. and it's making me miserable. but i feel like doing things just to experience doing them (i.e. being a person) is beyond me on my own. if i had a friend to do things with, that would be easier - but - something like going out to read a book in a park on a nice day sounds the exact same to me as eating a handful of dirt. my only reaction is "but why would i do that?" i feel joyless and trapped.

      what i think i'm hearing is some guilt about being goal oriented, and i don't know exactly where that came from. i'd say have fun setting goals and trying to do them. dont worry about eating dirt in the park, you dont have to do that

4.5.25  6:02 am   How do you stop overthinking whilst improvising?
Do you have times when nothing you play feels right? It obliterates my mood

      this is fun, play the 'dont know how to think' song for a few moments, to illustrate the fact that you must temporarily play the role of someone who is unable to think, because they've been temporarily prohibited from thinking as punishment for thinking too much. Or, here's another approach, this one's also fun. play the 'thinking way too much' song, where you play the role momentarily of someone who thinks way way too much. this is a fun character and your audience will demand a sequel just when you're ready to move on

4.5.25  4:06 am   have you ever tried (insert random food here)? if not you should try it

      i'm not totally following your logic. no, that's not true, i see what you're saying

4.5.25  3:41 am   do you like archaeopteryx and othet small fluffy dinosaurs

      admittedly not as much as others in my peer group

4.5.25  2:12 am   do you know more than one language and why

      maybe it would help me loosen up

4.5.25  1:49 am   can music represent order and/or chaos?

      maybe, but luckily it can represent other things too besides order and chaos. for anyone who's sick of all the neverending order and chaos merchandise out there

4.5.25  1:17 am   how do i become happy with all the unhappiness in the world

      same way you can sometimes also be unhappy despite all the happiness in the world

4.5.25  12:59 am   Why are you so determined that free will exists

      hmm... if it doesn't, then you theoretically wouldn't care about this. i figure sentience would be impossible without it. but don't take my word for it, i will let you decide what to think..... if you can

4.5.25  12:26 am   In Long Long Journey, you talk about remembering the moment your dreams were broken and throwing the postcard with them away. Do you think it's possible for someone to completely leave that moment behind, or is it too integral to the person we become because of it? *Should* we completely leave it behind?

      put it this way: it's possible for someone to sing about doing that, in a song

4.4.25  11:56 pm   when do you find the time to answer all these questions?

      for example, zaterdag 5 april 2025 22:07:53

4.4.25  6:42 pm   Whats the best pasta shape

      how about blob

4.4.25  5:28 pm   how do i get out of this bottomless pit i'm stuck in

      next, see if it has walls

4.4.25  5:28 pm   What instrument do you think is the closest to being mastered by humanity

      the obvious answer would seem to be 'voice', although for some reason i'm suddenly seeing 1000 different ways my answer could be misinterpreted here. what i mean to say is that it's been attached to us physically by default since the very beginning, so that ought to be a massive head start

4.4.25  5:23 pm   I'm embarrassed that these days my primary motivation for making art is for attention, not the love of making something

      i would guess that the roads lead to the same place. eventually (or soon) you'll get bored with anything other than the joy of making something. plus, eventually (or soon) you'll also realize that things made with actual passion will ultimately get you 1000x times more attention at the end of the day

4.4.25  5:11 pm   I love checking the weather, do you?

      checking the actual weather is certainly more fun than checking the weather forecast

4.4.25  4:38 pm   do you eventually stop accidentally going "ftANGG" on a guitar string or "bOMMM" on a piano, during an otherwise controlled/even-toned performance :|

      certainly the more you get used to the instrument you're using, the more comfortable and less clumsy you will seem to be. but either way, i hope it's not so 'even-toned' that there's no room for EXCITEMENT

4.4.25  3:03 pm   Should I dim my light a little (or a lot) so that I don't accidentally blind anyone and cause them to stumble?

      i don't necessarily see any clear evidence of it currently being a stumbling hazard. On one hand, the fact that you asked this is possible evidence that it is, but on the other hand the fact that you were unsure of the answer is possible evidence that it isn't.

4.4.25  2:56 pm   do you say "route" like root or like rout?

      might codeswitch

4.4.25  2:52 pm   best place to eat a sandwich?

      ON EARTH don't even joke about that

4.4.25  1:15 pm   Hi. recently, i have been struggling with communication. I seem to be unable to smoothly form any coherent phrase or sentence on the fly. I do not know whether it is caused by a new-found inability to form thoughts or whether it is induced by a lack of lingual ability or whether it is both at once. What would you have done if you have found yourself in a situation similar to this ?

      reading between the lines here, i think i'm seeing a couple of things happening. it's possible that your written language has recently leveled-up in its preciseness, which is distracting for your speaking life because speaking thrives in totally different ways. and now you're distracted by some new and more 'perfect' higher standards of precision that you've recently started to enjoy in written language. On the other hand, a totally different reason for the symptoms you've described; if you're talking to someone you regard very highly, and you feel anxiously eager for them to respect your.... 'correctness' of language use, then this can cause you to fall apart. because let's face it, good speaking communication requires a bit of something much rougher around the edges. and you're having trouble relaxing because of the fear that you might...... misconjugate

4.4.25  1:00 pm   whats your opinion on marvel rivals

      secretly not rivals

4.4.25  12:42 pm   opinion on a vanilla dairy queen ice cream cone dipped in canned spaghetti-o's?

      no comment

4.4.25  12:13 pm   What product would you impose a tariff on?

      hear me out ......... tariffs

4.4.25  12:08 pm   BOOOOOOO!!!! did i scare you

      no, but it's still a nice gesture

4.4.25  10:33 am   where do i end and the air around me begins? are there really any boundaries at the molecular level? isn't everything just one big thing?

      sure, everything is 1 thing, but that doesn't stop things from also being multiple things

4.4.25  7:34 am   whats with your recent increased interest in dutch?

      sorry for the misunderstanding, there has been a recent increased interest in french. dutch has already been firmly installed in my life for some time now

4.4.25  5:18 am   i asked you a question but then i forgot what it was, do you remember?

      was it this

4.4.25  5:15 am   When you write a song, do you write the sound effect too? Or you added it when you are making the song.

      i almost never do sound-design in the writing process. but lord knows i probably should

4.4.25  5:06 am   do you still have the full, unedited audio snippet of what came after the fade in "mount st. helens is about to blow up",

     yes

     or a .pdf document that shows what you wrote?

     it's a text file with audio references as needed

     because, i think about that part once in a while. i feel that you wrote something after that fade, it makes me intrigued about what is the true end of that song. with "true end" i mean the last note that appears in the sheet music for that song.

      i think you have it backwards. you are suggesting that i may have written an end, but then decided to fade it instead. but that never happens. what does happen sometimes is the exact opposite: it's written to fade, but then as i'm playing it, as a player, i have to actually stop sometime, and it ends up being worth including the way it stops. an example of this would be the end of "movie star". and an example of the exact same thing happening to somebody else would be the end of "new frontier" by donald fagen

     also, how often do you deal with people asking you for very specific questions about your songs?

     i still can't figure out the schedule for this actually

     i probably asked way too much, but works pretty well for the never-ending trivia on the website, i guess. still a big fan, and always will, thanks bill!

4.4.25  2:50 am   how do i do vibrato when singing

      i have no idea. how do you pick up an object? maybe you think that's simple, but if you've ever seen someone who's never done it try to do it, you'd wonder how the heck they're ever gonna learn it

4.4.25  1:25 am   thoughts on collaboration? 

      the best part is that commemorative sticker that says "we collaborated"

4.4.25  1:17 am   So you're good at math? Then name every number.

      remind me again what a number is

4.3.25  11:06 pm   How do I stop conceptualizing "it would take too long" as a reason not to do something?

      try more enjoyable activities. let's be honest, you probably wouldn't mind if those ones lasted a long time

4.3.25  11:04 pm   why am i so fucking stupid

      this is due to intelligence

4.3.25  10:49 pm   Is everything everyone says propaganda in some respect

      what you just suggested seems fundamentally true. while also being propaganda in some respect

4.3.25  10:47 pm   Favorite Conan Obrien moment?

      there's always that moment 10 layers deep into a relentless tirade, just when he knows he's got the entire room completely helpless with laughter, then suddenly he just starts rolling his R's for no reason

4.3.25  9:59 pm   what if there were no pillowcases?

      then people would be washing pillows
